body.name: Sweetcrispy Dresser for Bedroom with 5 Fabric Drawers, Small Chest Storage Tower, Organizer Units for Clothing Closet, Kidsroom Furniture, Steel Frame, Wood Top, Lightweight Quick Assemble Cabinet
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 26. Order within 13 hrs 49 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Pay attention to the FULL-size】This dresser for the bedroom with fabric bins will save your space and is a great furniture to store magazines, clothes for adult or boys and girls, kid's toys, etc. The wooden top board has a load-bearing capacity of up to 66 pounds and can be used instead of a TV stand. Kindly confirm that the full size of this 5-drawer dresser is: 38"L x 11.81" W x 20.87" H

【Ample Storage Space】2 large drawers and 3 small drawers offer large storage space, you can divide the area and make storage more neat. The large drawer at the bottom can store at least 12 ordinary adult T-shirts or 7 pairs of jeans. And the 3 small drawers can store socks, underwear, toddler toys etc. If you own multiple pieces of this dresser, they're also stackable to save space.

【Sturdy and Stable】This chest of drawers uses a thickened metal frame to keep it stable, with 4 adjustable feets to protect your floor from scratches, and you can adjust the balance of the dresser in small areas. Using the anti-tilt device, an auxiliary feature can be added if the dresser is attached to the wall, as it prevents falling caused by uneven floors or children climbing.

【Multifunctional Use】The dresser reduces the restrictions of use. You can use it freely with your existing furniture, such as replacing the TV stand in the living room, or as a nightstand, bedside table, wardrobe, closet in the bedroom, or as a shoe cabinet in the porch, entryway, hallway, etc. This fabric organizer is lightweight, only about 21 lb, and it can be moved anywhere without much effort.

【Quick Assemble】All the necessary installation tools are included in the package and you can find the guide video on this page. According to the instructions, you can complete the installation in about 30 minutes. Of course, the time will be shortened if you use your own power tools. If you have any questions about the installation process or product, we are ready to help you efficiently and at any time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes her toy room look awesome!!
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to put together, very light and sturdy.The top is hard like a dresser the drawers fabric. Bought the matching small desk and the other dresser. Redid my daughters toy room for Christmas and she was super happy. I also bought an over the door mesh stuffed toy holder w 4 compartments. All of her babys, Barbie’s and stuffies fit, an amazing amount of toys. Her room is super organized, no more toys laying around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this and I’m glad I ordered two. It was easy to assemble and the quality is nice. Fabric drawers with plastic handles. The top gives me extra “counter space” like a tall nightstand. Very cool. All the pieces came in good condition. Yes, buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Different than i expected but works good
reviews.reviewText: the wood part is what fooled me its really a fabric drawer but it comes with the wood on top which is what makes it worth it. Easy to assemble and surprisingly sturdy. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was in desperate need of a small-ish, inexpensive dresser for my niece, so I wound up looking at these fabric drawer dressers. I ordered this one based off of price and size, risking quality. The quality did not disappoint! Very nice and sturdy. I did not anchor mine to the wall, but it does come with the screws and anchors to do so, and even has holes in the frame to put the screws threw. Easy assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Cute
reviews.reviewText: It's small and fits perfectly at the end of a bed. The material is faux leather on the drawers. I'm very satisfied with the price. This would be nice inside a closet or utility room, or in a Child's room. I'm using it in a guest bedroom and it's fine for what I need. It does have a wooden top, for durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly for the price this works really well for storage in my walk-in closet. I will get a couple more in the near future for more storage needs for my clothes. Rather simple to assemble…totally done without any other person to help and sturdy, but lightweight for easy carry and moving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Low to ground & overall allot smaller than expected
reviews.reviewText: Dresser was easy to assemble & is sturdy being made with metal but the dresser IS NOT IDEAL for an adult bedroom. Very low to ground & drawers can’t fit too many clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my son. He was able to put it together fairly quickly and seems sturdy . Drawers are a bit small, but it’ll work if clothes are organized and folded well .
